page.title: 04Playground Games
page.content: By Laura Phoenix {'Toytown'}is my favourite game.I play it in the playground and at home.The game can go on for ever.You need two people or more,but it is a very miserable game only two,so it is best to have quite a few. When you play you have to have all the people in a circle ,but one ,who is in the middle. The people that are in the circle have to put both their hands out so that the person in the middle can tap them. While they tap the other people's hands they say a little rhyme that sounds like this "Toy town,toy town. Nothing but toy town,egg, bacon,fish and chips, apple pie and apple pips, eighty days around the world.Which one of these do you choose? Who ever's hand they land on,that person has to say what they want.Then they give them what they ask for and when they have
